content: This is such an amazing game and a beautiful app... Unfortunately online games are currently not working. Using the friend menu to create a game - it seems like it's trying to create but then doesn't actually initiate a game. Online lobby games let you put in password and join but as soon as it tries to load it gives an error about internet connection. I convinced two people to buy this so we could play online together and it won't even work...
good app
I'm color blind and love the different shades of Grey they use!

Very addictive game with some issues. Multiplayer is one of the biggest downfalls this game has. You are immediately replaced with an AI if you loose your connection. I was replaced while I was answering a text and the game was running in the background. This is frustrating to say the least. There is also a bug where the game goes completely black if the phone screen was locked during play. You have to force quit the game and start over. All games except campaign are lost including Multiplayer.
A beautiful board game that I enjoy very much.

Fun and challenging game! Beautiful and great sound design as well. I only have 2 problems: 1) the last 5 or so levels in campaign fail to exit to main menu after finishing and 2) Solo mode seems unachievable?! The points required are almost always double the max that can be scored on any difficulty level.
Fantastic digital version of the board game
Fun, but why is it only playable when I'm online? Makes it completely nonfunctional on my commute.
Gooooooood stuff!
Great design
True to the physical game with more, favorite way to spend a break then scrolling

I really enjoy this colorful dice game. However, I can't give it five stars because two of the tools "flux brush" and "glazing hammer" do not function correctly (these tools are supposed to "re-roll" the dice). I've written to the developers to fix this, but it hasn't been fully addressed.

Pleasant enough diversion, BUT as I'm playing on a TABLET, I really need to stick to games that work in LANDSCAPE mode. Holding a tablet vertically is awkward. That said, I definitely recommend OTHER games from Dire Wolf (Root, Yellow & Yantze, Raiders of the North Sea)
Beautiful, solid adaptation of the board game and lots of features, including the solo play variant
Great system. Love the music. Beautiful in every way
Great game!

A beautiful transposition of the original board game. Challenging and graphically very appealing. Undoubtedly a "must have" for hours of pure entertainment and intellectual challenges. Congratulations! After Android multi-plataforms issue solved (which I thank you) I just want to mention the drain battery problem, You should check it out! After that 5 stars will be scored! Keep up the good work ;)
replyContent: Hello Nuno! It seems one of our customer service members was mistaken. You can indeed play Sagrada on multiple devices so long as you are logged into your Google Play account. If you are still encountering this issue, please contact Google Play so that they may investigate or email us at support@direwolfdigital.com. Thank you, and have fun playing!

content: Plays beautifully.

Absolutely great game! Very well made, will worth the money. We play with friends from around the world but also sometimes enjoy the solo mode. Definitely recommend! Aldi, use Google play family library to buy it only once and share it with your whole family for free!

This is a great game and a well-made app! Sagrada is dice placing game where you and other players strategically place dice into a stained glass window frame and try to earn the highest score. Although there is plenty of strategy that can go into your decisions, it is very easy to learn and the in-game tutorial is short and helpful. The game is competitive but it is not stressful which I really appreciate. It is not a game centered around disrupting or sabotaging others. The majority of your time will be spent only focused on building your window while considering the best placement for dice to achieve the highest score. I have not experienced any errors while playing Sagrada. I am happy with my purchase of this game and I highly recommend it!

Really excellent. Online play is smooth, I only wish there were more online players out there. Issues with crashing and touch sensitivity I had in the past were all fixed within a couple of days which was awesome. It's as beautiful as the hard copy of the game. It would be nice if we could select from a few options our main window card (player colour), like how you get options in the hardcopy of the game.
replyContent: Hi Roman! Thank you for the kind review. Sorry to hear you have been running into an issue with the game crashing! If you haven't done so already, would you mind dropping a line via in-game feedback or to support@direwolfdigital.com so we can take a look?

content: An effective way to play on the go. Cross play rocks.
Excellent port of the board game!
replyContent:
Hi Francis!

Thanks so much for the awesome review, we are thrilled to hear you are enjoying Sagrada!

content: Relaxing at first, now frustrating I really liked this game in the beginning but I found the vs AI too easy even on the more challenging levels. In the solo mode I found it impossible to win! I've played at least 50 games and never came close to beating the target score. The goal is to get a higher score than the combined die on the track but if you try to keep only small value die on track you can't achieve the goals. The most frustrating is that it rarely lets me use my tools during solo.
replyContent:
Hi Audra!

Thanks for taking the time to share your thoughts. We deeply appreciate the constructive feedback, and it has been passed on to the team for review.

If you have any other feedback or run into any issues, you can also drop us a line to support@direwolfdigital.com so we can take a look!

content: I have been enjoying this game. No glitches so far.
Recognized the developers DireWolf from the excellent Eternal card game, Sagrada is a fun little game which has been well adapted to the digital format.
Beautiful and interesting to play - it's a bit of a learning curve to pick up the best way of playing, but once you get it, the range of puzzle designs make the levels more challenging as you go

Great game, not so good app. Every time I switch to a different window (like if I check a text) and go bavkn to the game, it's a black screen. It completely freezes and I have to exit and restart the app. Then I've lost the game I was in the middle of. Very disappointing.
replyContent: Hi Kaitlyn! We are so sorry to hear you are running into issues with Sagrada. If you have not done so already, please drop a line via in-game feedback or to support@direwolfdigital.com so we can take a look!

content: This game is both challenging and relaxing at the same time üòä
Great game if you like the board game! All the fun without the setup!
Great implementation.
The beautiful colors, music, and design of this app evoke the actual Familia de Sagrada Cathedral in Barcelona.
Great game great app!
Great fun love the physical edition and this great when I wanna play by myself

If you like the board game you'll like this app. Plays exactly the same. Could use a few tweaks such as a lounge for players to meet up for games. Can be difficult at times to find a game to get into. Other than that it's great!
replyContent: Thank you so much for your support! I will pass that suggestion along to the team. Have fun playing Sagrada!

content: Love this game. It really makes you think.
replyContent: Hi Fugi! Thanks so much for taking the time to leave a review! We appreciate your kind words and hope you continue to enjoy Sagrada!

content: Excellent port of the tabletop game - ADDICTING
replyContent: Hi Josh! We think its addicting too! Thanks for the kind words!!

content: Excellent
replyContent: Thanks for taking out time to rate us. It really helps us to keep going and delivering the best :)

content: Great adaptation of the board game. Fantastic graphics. Slightly slow load time, but never crashes.
replyContent: Hi Blaire! Thanks for taking the time to leave a review, we are happy to hear you are enjoying Sagrada! Sorry to hear you are experiencing long load times. If this is a frequently occurring issue, feel free to drop a line to support@direwolfdigital.com so we can take a look!

content: Love the board game! It's great to have the mobile version now. üòÅ
replyContent: Hi Sheila! Thanks so much for sharing an awesome review, we are happy to hear you are having fun!

content: Absolutely love this game, no issues.
A picture perfect adaptation of one of my favorite board games.

It has taken me a while to write a review, as I have been waiting for a response from the customer service or developers. I leave three stars, not for the game, but for the lack of response regarding an issue with the game. I had emailed Dire Wolf Digital my concern Sun, Sep 13, 1:54 AM, with a screenshot of the error. No response. I then reached out through Facebook, no response. I paid for this game, and love the aesthetic of it, the game play, and more. BUT, I would love to have the error fixed.
replyContent: Hi Regan! Sorry to hear you had trouble getting in touch with us! We took a look and somehow your email wound up in the Spam inbox! We will have someone reach out to help you right away!

content: I had some issues with older games which were no longer playable nor I could resign from. The guys at the support team fixed it all and now everything seems to be back to normal. Great and addictive game! It would be even better if they managed to update the app and enable games up to 6 players like the boardgame, which I am also enjoying a lot of with my friends and family.
replyContent: Thanks for taking the time to leave a review. Please reach out to support@direwolfdigital.com with some details about your Sagrada username and device and we will take a look!

content: I was in the middle of a game, then had to put my phone away for a few minutes, but when I tried to resume the game crashed and I lost all my progress.
replyContent: Hi Julian! Sorry to hear you ran into this issue with Sagrada. If you haven't done so already, please drop a line via the in-game feedback function so we can take a look!

content: A perfect phone game--rounds around about 10 minutes and always an interesting puzzle. The campaign is very fun and a good way to master the basics before trying other modes. No ads, no microtransactions, just a fun, beautiful, puzzly sudoku-like dice game.
Very pretty and plays just like the board game.
A very good of the excellent original boardgame.

I purchased after playing the physical game. It will be more fun once more download and play. The casual play games with other players can take weeks to finish. I enjoy live games much more and there is rarely someone available live. One minor improvement suggestion: the load time between screens is too long. I am referring to the screen change between casual games moves and the menu. And when you receive a notification that it is your turn the time to load is too long even if app minimized.
Flawlessly executed.

Fun, beautiful, and nice music. I really like the amount of effort that went into the colorblind mode. Solo mode is pretty hard though. I feel like certain objectives are much better, such as the 5/6 objective. Leaving 5s and 6s is so costly. I think the rolls determine whether your solo game is easy or hard more than the number of tools you have. It's fun, but a little frustrating at times.
I really enjoy this adaptation. I've been having a lot of fun with the campaign mode.
Quite well done conversion of the board game. Especial plus for the colourblind more, the physical game can't do that.
Superbe online adaptation of a cool boardgame!
A beautiful version of the actual game, made even easier to use with the pop-up tips.
I played this once at a gaming group somewhere, I am glad I found the digital version. Smooth animations and colorful graphics, along with Solo Campaign mode, and Pass&Play modes. Just buy it.

The only feature I wish could be added was the ability to choose what the goals will be for each game. Sometimes they are too low stakes and I would rather curate a more challenging combination. Also I would love to buy expansions.

A very good mobile adaptation of a very good board game. Several colored dice are drawn and rolled, then players take turns selecting one die at a time and placing them on their grids in a pattern. You're given different patterns as goals for each game. The music and the aesthetics are very pretty, which is nice since it's about crafting stained glass windows. The dice are made to look like stained glass cubes. A decent number of online play options are available. Fun game, would recommend!

Great adaptation, love it! But why no mouse/left button support? First game I ever played, where the left mouse "click" doesn't emulate the finger touch. Hope you fix this, and I'll gladly give it 5 stars! Keep up the good work!
LOVE THE GAME....ANY CHANCE YALL WILL BE INCLUDING THE EXPANSIONS????
With having to do social distancing, this app is an awesomely awesome way to play Sagrada with friends. Well worth to price.
Great digital implementation
Easy to play and understand. Love the graphics!
Great game, lovely looking.
Great adaptation of the physical game. Clean and beautiful interface and a decent tutorial that introduces a lot of the elements step by step.

Beautiful adaption of an excellent board game. It's quickly become a favorite. Only thing I would like to see changed is the ability to toggle my secret goal from displaying on the screen ( so that we don't have to hide screens from each other when we're playing side by side.) But that's a small cosmetic complaint. Highly recommended. EDIT - With the last update, they implemented my feature request. You guys rock. üôÇ
Fun and frustrating üôÉ
Brilliant. Now I can play it on the go.

Only thing I can think of is that I would like the freedom to pick my color player board, like in the actual board game by Floodgate Games... Literally nothing else I can think of, Great Job Dire Wolf Digital! üê∫üëç
Excellent!
Perfect and relaxing music
Fun game, sometimes crashes. But most of the time solid. I have found many hours of enjoyment from this.
replyContent: Thanks for taking the time to leave a review! If you continue to run into this issue, please report it in-game under Feedback, or let us know at support@direwolfdigital.com and we will take a look. And thanks for playing Sagrada!

content: too hard to figure out. sorry I bought. will uninstall.
Really good version of the board game. I find solo play very challenging.
Just as fun as the tabletop game but easy to play on the go. üòä
Fantastic! My new favorite game and to me is better than the board game version. Well worth the purchase.
It's a good implementation. Very true to the physical board game.
Incredible digital rendition of an already great game. Tons of fun with lots of tactical potential!

Actually learned to play this game for the first time using this app. Had never played with the actual physical game. So the app was a small investment to see whether I'd like it or not. I liked it enough to buy the base set plus the 5-6 player expansion. Taught my friends for the first time yesterday to play the physical game. I described the game to them Azul meets Yahtzee meets Candy Crush.

Absolutely beautiful game and plays just like the board game, the developers clearly put a lot of love into this game. With so many board game cash grabs it's super refreshing to see one made with care. For those who haven't played the board game this is a game that, like sudoku, is easy to learn and hard to master. It takes the random element of rolling dice and gives you amazing tools to use stragety. Couldn't recommend this more!
It's either too hard or I'm too stupid to beat solo mode. I guess I wasted my money on this. Won't be buying the physical game either because of this. It is nice looking though.
A very well developed/adapted game. Great graphics and beautiful music. You guys should do Blokus, Azul, and Azul: Stained Glass.
Fun game

This may be the the best digital implementation of a board game I've played. The only that makes me bust out the physical version of Sagrada over this digital game, is to roll the dice. I can't stop playing this.
Sometimes it takes awhile to load a game. I really like the game, but I have connectivity issues sometimes.
replyContent:
Thanks for taking the time to leave a review. We are glad that you are enjoying the game!

If you continue to run into connectivity issues, please reach out to support@direwolfdigital.com with some details about your device and region so that we can take a look.

content: Own the boardgame, this is a great adaptation. Online is a bit clunky.
Game plays fine, but every time I start up there's a bug where one menu is on top of another. The gameplay is rather slow. Needs a speed up button for those of us who want.
replyContent: Thanks for the heads up! We'll take a look into the issue. If you have any other feedback or suggestions, you can let us know at support@direwolfdigital.com or via in-game Feedback!

content: One of the best adaptations out there, it made me by the physical copy!
Very nice recreation of the physical game
Fun puzzle type game.
I Love this game ! But, it runs so slow and frequently malfunctions ‚òπÔ∏è

content: Excellent mobile implementation. It was a bit pricey, but the quality of the app quickly made me forget how much I paid... Worth it!
Great fun, I own the board game but this is great for on the go and when nobody else wants to play. Also great challenges and helps grasp harder boards that I normally don't attempt.
Good game just like the board game will it be getting expansions?
Excellent game play, beautiful graphics. Love being able to play with my family when we're apart!
This game is super fun if you like dice and/or purty colors and/or deep strategy. And the app is very smooth and stable and functional. *Highly* recommended to anyone who likes those things!

Fantastic implementation. Haven't tried online play, but am excited about it. Should there be stability issues, I'll post them. Otherwise, awesome to have this! The physical game is one of my favorites.
A really great adaptation of a fun board game
Faultless app of a great game
We have been playing the new Solo mode and it seems impossible to win even in the easy mode. Have you tested it a lot?
Replicates the board game perfectly and on line is a bonus in lock down!

Solid game adaptation, but it loses connection on almost every single turn! The game tries to blame the network, but by wifi is solid. Very frustrating making my partners wait for my technical difficulties.
replyContent: Thanks for taking the time to leave a review. Please drop us a line via in-game Feedback (under Options), or to support@direwolfdigital.com with some details about your device, region, and when you have experienced this, and we'll take a look!

content: Really enjoy the game, and the controls and display feel really smooth. A couple of minor improvements they could make: 1) when its not my turn, i can't swipe to see anyone's board but the current player, even my own. Id like to be able to look at those at any time. 2) load time is a bit slow. Since a turn only takes a few seconds, I would like it if I could open the app, load my game, make my move, and be done in the span of 10-20 seconds. Right now it takes about 10 seconds just to load.

Thanks for taking the time to leave a review!

content: The May 19 update says it fixed an occasional problem with releasing Achievements. I never had this problem until after the update. Right now I can't even see any further items in the Campaign. Unless I've reached the end in which case it should say something to that effect!

content: Maybe the best boardgame port I've played. I own the physical copy, and I like it, but I love this app. Online multiplayer works, 3 solo options (campaign, vs AI, and solo mode). Lots of variety, smooth gameplay. I love actually rolling dice, but this has everything else to enjoy about the game.
It used to worrk but now is unusable! Can't add friends! Previous friends have been deleted! What's going on??

content: Multiplayer drops most every time but solo and ai play are awesome.

content: Is quite good.
Great game, well excited port of the original board game, fun single player modes.
I really enjoy this game. It's one of my favourite.
Beautiful and fun! Very faithful to the board game

I love the box game and this app is, for all intents and purposes, spot on identical. Even the background music I find soothing and relaxing. My only criticizm is I would have gone for slightly bolder dice colors, but that is being nit picky. Great job, and well worth the wait!

I absolutely love this game but we keep having connectivity issues and that is getting very frustrating. Please make your online games more stable. Update: We've now tried the other type of game where you get notifications to take your turn, but I still got booted and now I'm getting notifications every time it is my turn... But I can't take a turn, because I can't find the game.
replyContent: Thanks for taking the time to leave a review! We'll take a look into this issue. If you have any other feedback or questions, you can always let us know via in-game Feedback or at support@direwolfdigital.com

content: It's a good experience of playing the game. I had some minor wifi stability issues, but I was always able to rejoin the game already in progress after just a moment's effort, and I'm really grateful that it has cross platform play with Steam, so I can play with my siblings who don't have the mobile version ‚ò∫Ô∏è
Faithful rendition of the excellent board game!

Great version of the board game with all of the game functions built in. It even has great details like letting you view your game card under the placed die. I wish it had push notifications for online games though. Games with multiple people are taking forever because no one knows when it's their turn.
I look forward to the expansion to add new strategies :) thanks for a beautiful implementation!
A wonderful adaptation of one of my favorite dice games. A nice, clean interface and the single player challenges offer some unique problems to solve. Very much recommend!
Great adaptation of the board game üëåüé≤
fantastic digital version of a solid boardgame! Can't wait for the inevitable expansions to be added
Great implementation, but missing the solo variant available in the physical game.
Enjoy as much as the board game

Good game (was originally a board game), and excellent software implementation overall. A few small complaints. 1. Some of the Tool descriptions are confusingly worded, and I can't find help info to explain them better. 2. There doesn't seem to be anything that can compute game score for you or opponents until the end. Would be helpful if this could be done at earlier points in the game.
Great table-top-to-mobile game! I'm having a lot of fun with this one.
2 games in, nice digital version of the board game. No complaints so far.

Yes. Love this game. Sometimes the AI intimidates me with their fancy names, but I still manage to put dice down incorrectly. The only issue I have is I think a more detailed explanation or perhaps examples are needed on the tools. Some are pretty easy to understand and some other have me a bit flummoxed. Other than that, I'm hooked.
Amazing digital adaptation of the board game. Beautifully done.

The game itself is super fun and the App is another Dire Wolf beauty, but the network handling can be pretty buggy. When playing online I have to Force Close quite often to get the Lobby to load and sometimes the buttons just stop working, etc.
This is a perfect implementation of the board game, Sagrada. Support replied very quickly to an issue I had. Turned out to be a non-issue, but they were very helpful.
Beautiful and fun!

A beautiful adaptation of a beautiful game. Fun, thought-provoking, and even frustrating at times (for the right reasons of not getting the perfect roll you need). And the music! It sets the tone for game play perfectly. Seriously, is there a track available somewhere of it online?
Excellent digital translation of the original board game.
Excellent digital version of a great board game! Graphics are beautiful and the game itself is relaxing in these stressful times. One reques--please add the expansions later!
Beautiful rendition of a fun game.
Would be 5 stars but online is choppy and round don't load as often as they do load.
Fantastic version. Perfect.

A very fun, thinky kind of game. The rules make for a game that requires you to really think even on easy settings, and causes you to agonize over choices in the harder boards. This app is a very good adaptation of an excellent board game. Online play works well and the local "campaign" is quite challenging. Love this game!
Fantastic
A very well done Sagrada experience!
I love the original board game and love the app just as much! It's so great that I can play this game anytime.
This is an excellent port of the great board game!
Love the digital game. Have the physical game with expansion. The digital version helped me easily understand the game .

The only Dire Wolf Digital game that does not show up fullscreen on my chromebook (I own them all). Minor issue because it still looks great and works well. The animation, controls, interface, and gameplay all work great. Good mix of strategy and chance with dice. I've never played the physical game, but this digital version has me hooked. Big fan of Dire Wolf Digital games and this is another great one! Thank you to all who put this game app together. Can't wait to see more digital titles!
A thinking game but very accessible. A good amount of replayability without being addictive.

Fantastic game, the graphics really pop on my Moto G7. The presentation is amazing, with great effects when you finish a game. The gameplay is simple to learn but difficult to master. I really enjoy there's is a campaign, Vs AI and and online component, there is even pass & play. Can see myself playing this every day, great to relax with but with strategy with 3 difficulty levels to challenge yourself with. 5/5.

Dire Wolf are knocking it out of the park with their graphics and UI lately. This is a fantastic production. Sadly though, they're lacking in AI, which I consider to be crucial. Straight out of the tutorial I jumped into a game against the hardest AI and almost doubled its score. Refunded it because, honestly, where is there to go after that?
Enjoying everthing
Awesome digital representation of a great boardgame.
This is very new, and there are some bugs, but still a pretty solid implementation.
If you enjoy Sagrada, you'll love this faithroll adaptation.

Great rendition of a great tabletop game. The real-time multiplayer works flawlessly. The artwork is very well done and true to the original. Highly recommended if you're stuck inside during a pandemic and want to pass the time with friends at a distance.

It's great. Saw it on an episode of Northernlion Tries on YouTube. He played the PC version and it was right up my alley and when I went to download it, I saw there was a mobile version and picked it up here instead. It's like a colorful, competitive, Sudoku :)

Loved the board game and the app version even more. Has a few kinks to work out since it was just launched, but updates come out steadily and the game is as satisfying and challenging as the tabletop version, except I save time from having to count up the points myself.
A great implementation
Gameplay works but updates don't. I have updated the app, and uninstalled and reinstalled the game but it continues to tell me I have to update to play.
replyContent: Please reach out to support@direwolfdigital.com with some details about your device and region and we'll take a look!

content: Well designed game, great translation to app
Wonderful representation of an extraordinary game!
This is an excellent adaptation. Graphics are bright and colourful, the gameplay is smooth. Brilliant job. Hoping the expansions aren't too far behind :)
This game is challenging and relaxing. It has a great aesthetic and a laid back atmosohere that I really enjoy. Love the Eternal CCG by the same studio.
Great game. Hope they will come out with the expansions.

Hi, it's a great game, the only issue I have is the speed in changing game boards when playing more than one person at a time. You have to click the 3 lines then save and exit. It would be so much better if there was a 'next game board' button or similar. Keep up the good work :)
This is a great implementation of the physical game. I just wish I could see the public objectives before I picked my window.
Very pleasant puzzle game, slightly more complex than it looks.

Created a screen name with less than the allowed 20 characters. Then attempted to then create an account to play online. The game wont accept my screen name as it's "to long", even though it's 17 of the 20 allowed characters. There for I can not play with friends or online. Sadly that was my WHOLE reason to getting the name. Hopefully this issues will be fixed in the future, but as it stands only a 1 star since half the game is unavailable for me to play.
replyContent: Thanks for the heads up, we'll take a look!

content: A stunningly beautiful and streamlined digital port of the physical game.
I have played this game at the table only one time. This is a beautiful adaptation of it. I would like to see my achievements. I see when I get one, but I cannot find the whole list.
Great game
Great digital version of a great board game!
This is an amazing app from one of my favorite game publishers! I love Sagrada on table top and I was not disappointed by the game app! So worth the price!

Beautiful game with smooth play for the phone. Captures the spirit of the board game perfectly, which is a delightful dice drafting game with more strategy than you'd think! Lots of fun, great to play with friends from a distance.
Excellent app of a great game
Love it
Great game, expect an update DELETED ALL CAMPAIGN PROGRESS. Brutal.

Tutorial went fine, first game with my wife went fine... but since then I can't do anything. I can't send game invites to her, I can't join the games she invites me to, nothing. If I send an invite, it says "couldn't send invitation", and if I try to join games, it sits there loading for a long time, and then just stops. Tried updating, tried uninstalling and reinstalling. Nothing has changed.
replyContent: Please reach out to support@direwolfdigital.com with some details about your device and we'll take a look!

content: What a wonderful game! My son likes playing with me, helping me to figure out moves. The online multiplayer is a great touch as well to be able to play with other people during this lockdown. Artwork is nice, represents the game well and brings it to life digitally. The color-blind option is probably the best feature, as for someone colorblind (me) it makes this game playable (the physical version I can't because I can't see the difference between blue and purple).
Love this game! At first seemed simple however after a few turns it got deep real fast.
Very pretty game, and crisp sounds. Also the deeper gameplay than I expected.
Amazing implementation
So far, really great game!
Works well and runs smoothly. Music and sound effects are great.

So far I'm loving it! It has everything I want in a board game adaptation: A great solo campaign, pass and play multiplayer, online multiplayer with both real time and asynchronous modes, and a great interface to tie it all together. The fact that it works in portrait mode is icing on the cake. Let's just hope that they add support for expansions!
Fantastic adaptation of a fantastic board game.

This is a beautiful implementation of a beautiful boardgame. The graphics perfectly match the stained glass theme of the game and there are a variety of play styles for different groups (Campaign, Online, and Pass & Play). Highly recommended!
Awesome port of a fantastic board game! Dire Wolf digital does it again. First Raiders of the North Sea, now this?! Keep it up!
Love it. Great adaptation of the Wonderful board game.
Update: I downloaded Sagrada today on my Samsung Note. I was very pleased on the tutorial and how smooth it was to play. Great app. Easy to learn and play. It plays true to the board game.
Great digital version of my favorite board game. Plays just like the real game. Love it!
Wish there is a place to view windows for previous game instead of just at the end game. It's a brilliant and beautiful game.
Super Brilliant. Have Tabletop and now Mobile! Super Happy!
If you enjoy the board game or want to do a competitive, pretty dice sudoku game, check it out.
A great adaptation of a fun board game that makes it easy to set up and play. Single player campaign could do with more content but everything else is top notch.
A lot of people seems to have problem with the game. The game have a lot of bugs. I can't even start a game. I hope you will fix the problems quickly.
replyContent: Please drop a line to support@direwolfdigital.com with some details about your device and the issue you are seeing and we'll take a look!

content: Edit: i dont know what you did but you fixed the issue. Thank you! So happy. Very fun game. Changed review to 5 stars now. üòä (Game freezes after tutorial. I want a refund. Waste of ten dollars. üò≠)
replyContent:
Hello Jordan, 

Thanks for leaving a review and apologies that you are encountering this issue! Please reach out to support@direwolfdigital.com with some details about your device and we'll take a look!

content: Great game ! Same as the gameboard. You can play vs friends online or with pass & play. You can also play alone against 1 or multiple AI. Would give it 5 stars BUT there is a bug. I can't play a game after I closed the first instance I started of the game. I get stuck on the splash screen. I have to re-install to be able to play again. Update : DWD Support did contact me and I was able to correct this problem. I can now play the game :-). Had to start the game through "Play games" shortcut.
replyContent:
Thanks for taking the time to leave a review, and apologies that you are running into this issue!

Please make sure that the game is fully updated by checking the Google Play Store. We will review your email to support@direwolfdigital.com and follow up there!

content: Great game
Plays just like the board game!
